textAfterTable: a student from Chicago, IL 02/29/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 2 of 25 Categories Comments Tips for prospective students come and join us! In three sentences nowadays city colleges of chicago are experiencing an outstanding outcomes more than the previous times, and this show the hard work of not only professors and the students but also the administrations. even though there are some security problems, truman college is very a good place to complete the associate degree and transfer to a four year university. everyone should pass though community colleges if he wants to save money too.
